categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Limm Nix was a major in the Alliance to Restore the Republic who fought at the Battle of Corrdair during the Galactic Civil War before or during 1 BBY against the Imperial bipedal All Terrain Missile Platform walkers, also known as AT-MPs. During that confrontation, Nix quipped in what turned out to be the major's final transmission that the All Terrain Missile Platforms looked like the stunted litter of an All Terrain Scout Transport, another model of bipedal walker. Nix laughed and expressed a lack of concern about the threat posed by the AT-MPs. However, Nix was then surprised by something, and the major's transmission ended abruptly.

Limm Nix was first mentioned in the "AT-MP (All Terrain Missile Platform)" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of LucasArts' video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010.
